transArray.content: Recommend staying again. This time I brought my baby to stay, and the overall experience was very good. The attitude and service of all the staff were great and warm.

Thank you for your high praise. The child is very cute and your family is very considerate. Your evaluation of us is full of love and warms the hearts of Orange people. Although the encounter is short, the memories are eternal. I hope you will look back and be in a good mood every day. ! We will continue to work hard to live up to your trust! All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy life and smooth work!
